data.text: @timgloverash People need to be respectful of those that don’t want to wear them too!
@timgloverash @MartinMcD85 @malew51 I was replying to martin. I wasnt called covid a cold. I too suffered and feel people are forgetting how bad it can be

@PlagueIsle @malew51 @timgloverash Yes I have, I had flu like fever for 1 day then spent 10 days isolating in my room from my wife and young daughter! Like 98% of everyone else who gets COVID it’s not serious, unfortunately for some it will be serious like all illnesses
@PlagueIsle @MartinMcD85 @malew51 Yes - as has my wife who is suffering suspected long Covid issues so your point is?
@MartinMcD85 @malew51 @timgloverash A cold doesnt really put you in bed for over a week and long cold isnt a thing. Have you have covid?
@Ben71036915 @timgloverash I’m typing the same as others but yet u comment on this why not others

@timgloverash Not again ! More than respectful of others but anyone with half a brain knows this is purely going to go up for next few weeks whilst people can get their 10 day isolation before the 31st. Hopefully not going back to people arguing over who wears a mask. It's choice

@PlagueIsle @malew51 @timgloverash Coz we don’t mandate mask wearing for cold and flu viruses or general chest infections every year, and COVID is meant to be endemic now 🤷🏻‍♂️ how many people out of all these new cases are actually suffering worse than they would with a normal cold 🤔 that’s the main question
